Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:


Director Chu Yuan is famous for introducing elements of murder mysteries, detective tales, and emotional melodrama into kung-fu films. This is one of those skilled thrillers, where-in he uses two editors and three martial arts choreographers to tell a tale of kidnapping, murder, frame-ups, and even being buried alive.
 The kung-fu takes on a macabre, horrific flair in this stunning story of swordsmen and women struggling to save their true loves ... and their sanity.
